search_results.title: Jonathan Sterne | Art History & Communication Studies
search_results.snippet: Jonathan Sterne. James McGill Professor of Culture and Technology. **On leave 2024-2025**. Fields of interest: sound studies; media theory and historiography ...

search_results.title: About Jonathan – Sterneworks
search_results.snippet: Jonathan Sterne teaches in the Department of Art History and Communication Studies at McGill University. He is author of Diminished Faculties.

search_results.title: Farewell to Jonathan Sterne | Duke University Press News
search_results.snippet: We are very sad to learn of the death of communication scholar Jonathan Sterne, after a long battle with cancer. He was 54 years old.
